name: Gallery Just Better
author: Stefania Marchisio

sections.installation:
1. From Plugins of your wordpress administration, select “Add new”, search for “gallery just better” into the search text-box then click on ‘Install Now’ (below the plugin name) when prompted OR download this plugin from wordpress repository or from Stef’s blog, unzip it (a directory with 2 files will be extracted) and upload it to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory of your wordpress

  2. Activate the plugin from the Plugins menu in your WordPress administration

  3. Use it! (see Usage in Other Notes)
sections.faq:
Why would I need/want it?

it can either be a replacement to wp native gallery if you need the added features described above or a simple no frills/no nonsenses gallery. More, much more to come.
